title: Prayer Requests
text:
Hopefully you are accessing the Prayer Request Board daily as you pray before studying. An important part of small-group studies is to pray with and for one another.

 

If you have not yet done so, please access the Prayer Request Board and post a prayer today. It can be for yourself, or a loved one, or a causeâ€”anything on your heart right now. Let the others in the group join you in this prayer this week.

 

Tap the plus sign in the red bubble in the lower right to post. This is how you post on your group Message Board as well.
